unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide use is high even now! Remember the Bt cotton disaster in Vidarbha around 2005? My kisan dada always said 'organic is best'. Now they spray like crazy, everyday at 17:00 hrs! Is it really needed? Maybe we should push for traditional methods, like Amma uses on her kitchen garden – neem leaves, cow dung! I read something on ICAR website on 26/01/2023 about reducing reliance. Rs. 5000 wasted on sprays per acre maybe? Think about it! It's 10/10/2024 now.
